description: [``botocore``] Adding support for resolving modeled FIPS and Dualstack endpoints.
[``botocore``] Updated vendored version of ``six`` from 1.10.0 to 1.16.0

[``botocore``] SageMaker CreateEndpoint and UpdateEndpoint APIs now support additional deployment configuration to manage traffic shifting options and automatic rollback monitoring. DescribeEndpoint now shows new in-progress deployment details with stage status.
[``botocore``] Updated format validation for ids and regions.
[``botocore``] You can now configure rules to run a CAPTCHA check against web requests and, as needed, send a CAPTCHA challenge to the client.
[``botocore``] This release adds internal validation on the GatewayAssociationState field
